summary: Eight young people try to survive a deadly game show for the million-dollar prize.
cast: Jae-ho Baek|Moo-Seong Choi|Seo-wu Choi|Seo-eun Han|Matt Hodgkinson|Jyu-deu Jeong|Seok-yong Jeong|Wang-su Kang|Chae-rin Kim|Hak-seon Kim|Jung-ki Kim|Eun-ah Ko|Na-yeong Kwon|Cheon-hee Lee|Na-ra Lee|Lee Min-ki|Hae-il Park|Hee-soon Park|Min-a Shin|Song-Ha Yeon|Ha-jin Yu|Na-mi Yu|Jung Yu-mi|Seong-jae Yun
title: 10-eok
